articles.title: TCL's latest 6-Series Roku TV has serious gaming chops - The Verge
articles.description: TCL has announced its 2022 6-Series Roku TV, with upgraded gaming capabilities compared like 4K gaming at up to 144Hz. The 6-Series continues to feature Mini LED technology for fantastic picture quality.
articles.content:
